title: Crisis on the Kanawha
creator_credit: Stuart Finley and Ohio River Valley Water Sanitation Commission
brief_description: Discusses the industrial pollution of the Kanawha River in West Virginia. Describes the program which is underway to solve the waste treatment problem, and explains industry’s primary role in eliminating pollution. Considers assistance given by local and state agencies.
